article: My name  _  Bob. I live _  Toronto, Canada, and I want a pen pal in China. I think China is a very  interesting country. I am 14 _ old.And my birthday is _  November. I can _  English and a little  French. I have two brothers. They have  pen pals in the United Kingdom and Australia .I like going to the movies _  my friends and playing sports. My favorite subject in school is PE. It is fun.But I don not like math. It is too difficult!Can you write _ me soon?
